alert.note: Alert for Bristol Bay (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 19 at 4:33AM AKDT until March 19 at 7:00AM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM AKDT THIS MORNING NORTH OF DILLINGHAM... * WHAT...Blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. North winds gusting as high as 35 mph. Visibilities reduced to one half mile. * WHERE...Bristol Bay, north of Dillingham. * WHEN...Until 7 AM AKDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel may be difficult. Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and winds will taper off through the morning hours, leading to improved conditions by midday. The area of greatest threat is for the villages of Koliganek and New Stuyahok. Dillingham is no longer expected to see blowing snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
